verses.arabic_text: ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Hour has drawn near and the moon has split asunder[1].

verses.arabic_text: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ
verses.translation: Whenever they see a sign[2], they turn away and say, “Same old magic!”

verses.arabic_text: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
verses.translation: They deny [the truth] and follow their desires, but every matter will reach its inevitable end.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: There have already come to them stories [of destroyed nations] that are sufficient to deter them,

verses.arabic_text: حِكۡمَةُۢ بَٰلِغَةٞۖ فَمَا تُغۡنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: which contain extensive wisdom, but the warnings are of no avail.

verses.arabic_text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: So turn away from them [O Prophet]. On the Day when the caller[3] will summon them to a horrific event[4],

verses.arabic_text: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ
verses.translation: with eyes downcast, they will come out of the graves like scattered locusts,

verses.arabic_text: مُّهۡطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ يَقُولُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَسِرٞ
verses.translation: rushing headlong towards the caller. The disbelievers will say, “This is a hard Day!”

verses.arabic_text: ۞ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ فَكَذَّبُواْ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُواْ مَجۡنُونٞ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ
verses.translation: The people of Noah rejected [the truth] before them; they rejected Our slave and said, “He is a madman,” and he was intimidated.

verses.arabic_text: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَغۡلُوبٞ فَٱنتَصِرۡ
verses.translation: So he called upon his Lord, “I am overpowered, so help me!”

verses.arabic_text: فَفَتَحۡنَآ أَبۡوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٖ مُّنۡهَمِرٖ
verses.translation: So We opened the gates of the sky with water pouring down in torrents,

verses.arabic_text: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: and We caused the earth to burst forth with springs, then the waters met for a preordained purpose.

verses.arabic_text: وَحَمَلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلۡوَٰحٖ وَدُسُرٖ
verses.translation: We carried him on an [Ark made] of planks and nails,

verses.arabic_text: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: sailing under Our [Watchful] Eyes; as a reward for the one [they] denied.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: We have certainly left it[5] as a sign; is there anyone to take heed?

verses.arabic_text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Then how were My punishment and My warnings[6]?

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: We have certainly made the Qur’an easy to understand and remember; is there anyone to take heed?

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: ‘Ād disbelieved. Then how were My punishment and My warnings?

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِي يَوۡمِ نَحۡسٖ مُّسۡتَمِرّٖ
verses.translation: We sent against them a furious wind[7] on a day of continuous misfortune,

verses.arabic_text: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ
verses.translation: sweeping people away[8], as if they were trunks of uprooted palm trees.

verses.arabic_text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Then how were My punishment and My warnings?

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: We have certainly made the Qur’an easy to understand and remember; is there anyone to take heed?

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: Thamūd rejected the warnings,

verses.arabic_text: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: They said, “Shall we follow a single human being[9] from among us? Then we would surely be in error and insanity!

verses.arabic_text: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ
verses.translation: Has the revelation been sent down upon him out of all of us? Rather, he is an insolent liar.”

verses.arabic_text: سَيَعۡلَمُونَ غَدٗا مَّنِ ٱلۡكَذَّابُ ٱلۡأَشِرُ
verses.translation: Tomorrow they will know who the insolent liar is.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
verses.translation: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them, so watch them [O Sālih] and be patient,

verses.arabic_text: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ
verses.translation: and tell them that the water is to be shared between them[10]; each should take its drink in turn.

verses.arabic_text: فَنَادَوۡاْ صَاحِبَهُمۡ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: But they called their companion[11], and he undertook the task[12] and hamstrung her.

verses.arabic_text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Then how [terrible] My punishment and My warnings were!

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
verses.translation: We sent against them a single blast, leaving them like trampled hedge-building twigs[13].

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: We have certainly made the Qur’an easy to understand and remember; is there anyone to take heed?

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ قَوۡمُ لُوطِۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lot rejected the warnings.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٖۖ نَّجَّيۡنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٖ
verses.translation: We sent against them a storm of pebbles, except the family of Lot whom We saved before dawn,

verses.arabic_text: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: as a blessing from Us. Thus do We reward those who give thanks.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡاْ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: He had already warned them of Our punishing assault, but they doubted the warnings.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَآ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: They even demanded that he let them have their way with his angel-guests[14], so We blinded their eyes, [saying], “Taste My punishment and My warnings!”

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ صَبَّحَهُم بُكۡرَةً عَذَابٞ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
verses.translation: By the early morning a lasting torment overtook them.

verses.arabic_text: فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Taste My punishment and My warnings!

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: We have certainly made the Qur’an easy to understand and remember; is there anyone to take heed?

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: Indeed, warnings came to the people of Pharaoh.

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: But they rejected all of Our signs, so We seized them with the grip of the All-Mighty, Most Powerful.

verses.arabic_text: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Are your disbelievers [O Makkans] superior to those[15] or have you been granted immunity in divine Scriptures?

verses.arabic_text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ نَحۡنُ جَمِيعٞ مُّنتَصِرٞ
verses.translation: Or do they say, “We are a united front, bound to prevail.”?

verses.arabic_text: سَيُهۡزَمُ ٱلۡجَمۡعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: Soon their united front will be defeated, and they will flee[16].

verses.arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: But the Hour is their appointed time, and the Hour is more catastrophic and more bitter.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, the wicked are in error and madness[17].

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: On the Day when they will be dragged into the Fire on their faces, [they will be told], “Taste the agony of Hell[18]!”

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ بِقَدَرٖ
verses.translation: We have surely created everything in a determined measure[19].

verses.arabic_text: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
verses.translation: Our command is but a single word[20], which is fulfilled in the blink of an eye.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: We have destroyed many like you [O Makkans][21]; is there anyone to take heed?

verses.arabic_text: وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٖ فَعَلُوهُ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Everything they did is in the written records,

verses.arabic_text: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٖ وَكَبِيرٖ مُّسۡتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: and everything, small or big, is written down.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَنَهَرٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and rivers[22],

verses.arabic_text: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ
verses.translation: seated in honor in the presence of the Most Powerful Sovereign.
